import React from 'react' const Welcome = () => { const titleStyle = { color: "#7fccbd", fontSize: "50pt", fontWeight: "normal", margin: "0px" } const subtitleStyle = { color: "white", fontSize: "16pt", fontWeight: "normal", padding: "10px" } const imgDivStyle = { margin: "auto", display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", flexWrap: "wrap", width: "50%", margin: "0px", padding: "0px", backgroundColor: "white", } const imgStyle = { height: "100%", width: "100%", margin: "0px", padding: "0px", } return (
{/* when phone sized hide img and make welcom card 100% */}

Javier
Violante

Software Engineer, Game Programmer

) } export default Welcome
